replies.bodyText: That would be possible, but as we have to support Java 7, that would mean that we would have to use com.google.cloud.base.Function in the public interface. I think that it is more idiomatic to use inheritance than composition for Java 7 (once we drop Java 7 support, I would agree that using composition would be a lot nicer in this case).
